'''Trial of Disembodiment''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Natlan]]. It involves entering three mystical chambers and completing the challenges within.

This HEO is not associated with a ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement. It rewards three [[Precious Chest]]s (one per challenge) and one [[Luxurious Chest]].

==Dialogue==

:O you who have traversed foreign lands to reach this place&mdash;
